titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to repeal the provisional quorum provision.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 5/17/2005--Introduced. Amends rule XX (Voting and Quorum Calls) of the Rules of the House of Representatives to repeal the provisional quorum mechanism which is to be used if the House should be without a quorum due to catastrophic circumstances.
